properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 9:32PM EST until February 12 at 8:20AM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers ...
South Chickamauga Creek Near Chickamauga TN affecting Catoosa and
Hamilton Counties
Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County
Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Bledsoe...Marion and
Sequatchie Counties

Additional heavy rains will move into the area early Tuesday morning,
then the rains will taper off during the day Tuesday.  After the rains
end, larger creeks and rivers will continue to rise , as waters flow
in from tributaries.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Pigeon River At Newport TN.
* From tomorrow early afternoon until Wednesday morning.
* At 09:00 PM Monday the stage was 5.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
* Nonflood flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by tomorrow early afternoon and
continue to rise to near 8.5 feet by tomorrow evening. The river
will fall below flood stage by early Wednesday morning.
* At 8.0 feet...Minor flooding occurs downstream from gage on Highway
25/70 and in the community of Edwina. Jimtown Road may be affected.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
